SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionOrder
Helper class that constructs a Message to be sent back to the client as an order acknowledgement.
ActionOrderStatus
Helper class that constructs a Message to be sent back to the client with their order status information.
Barista
Barista listens for incoming connections and creates a ClientInterface on a new thread for each connection assigning a new incrementing clientId.
Cafe
A class that contains the 3 areas that drinks can be in and handles the moving of drinks between them, the list of clients currently in the cafe, the number of clients waiting for orders and the information for the drinks.
Client
Data structure to hold information relating to each client
ClientInterface
A ClientInterface is created on its own thread for every new client that joins the cafe, it performs a handshake with a Customer which is determined by the passed socket from Barista.
Coffee
Extended data structure for Coffee.
Customer
Customer is the client and handles the interface between the user and the server, passing all inputs to the ServerInterface.
Drink
Parent data structure class for the drinks the cafe can use.
DrinkType
Enumerator list for the types of drinks in the VirtualCafe
Log
Data structure to hold the cafe status information which is used to serialize to Json and store int Log.json.
Logging
For handling the logging to terminal and logging to Log.json
Message
Holds information for the messages sent between the server and the client
MessageCommand
All possible commands for a Message.
ServerInterface
This class serves as the interface between the server and the customer program, it performs a handshake to connect to the server.
ServerListener
Class that continuously listens for messages from the server as long as the connection is valid.
ServerWriter
Class that handles all messages sent to the server after handshake is completed and connection is valid.
Tea
Extended data structure for Tea.
Water
Extended data structure for Water.
